name: WebGL2RenderingContext.isSampler
description: The WebGL2RenderingContext.isSampler() method of the WebGL 2 API returns true if the passed object is a valid WebGLSampler object.

refs.name: WebGL 2.0
refs.description: The definition of 'isSampler' in the 'WebGL 2.0' specification.
